title: compresses and encrypts
extract: Encrypting tape adds security, but it can also add significant costs if you attempt to encrypt your data before compressing it. ... However, compressed data encrypts just as well as uncompressed data. Therefore, you should compress your backups before you encrypt them.
extract_html: Encrypting tape adds security, but it can also add significant costs if you attempt to encrypt your data before compressing it. ... However, compressed data encrypts just as well as uncompressed data. Therefore, you should compress your backups before you encrypt them.
